kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=(//android.view.View[@content-desc="This field is required"])[1]' attribute 'content-desc' value 'This field is required'
kw.doc: Get element attribute using given attribute: name, value,...

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.msg: Set test message to: validation error message with 'This field is required'
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.

test.status: validation error message with 'This field is required'

kw.name: Check validation error message Android
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="This field must be 2 characters or longer!"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//android.view.View[@content-desc="This field must be 2 characters or longer!"]' attribute 'content-desc' value 'This field must be 2 characters or longer!'
xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="This field must be 2 characters or longer!"]
${actual} = This field must be 2 characters or longer!
kw.doc: Get element attribute using given attribute: name, value,...

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.msg: Set test message to: validation error message with 'This field must be 2 characters or longer!'
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.

kw.arg: xpath=//android.view.View[@content-desc="This field must be 2 characters or longer!"]
This field must be 2 characters or longer!

test.status: validation error message with 'This field must be 2 characters or longer!'

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
